name: Responsive Email
subject: <%= subject %>
htmlBody:
<% function printPrice(p){ return String(Math.round(p)).replace(/(.*)([0-9]{3})/,'$1 $2'); } var hasProducts1 = (typeof products1 != 'undefined'); var hasProducts2 = (typeof products2 != 'undefined'); /* remove polyfill and unsubscribeParam definition in ^persoo-0.28 */ var polyfill = {};(function (r){ e="ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/=", r.btoa||(r.btoa=function(r){for(var o,n,a=String(r),i=0,c=e,d=""; a.charAt(0|i)||(c="=",i%1);d+=c.charAt(63&o>>8-i%1*8)){if(n=a.charCodeAt(i+=.75),n>255)throw new Error( "\'btoa\' failed: The string to be encoded contains characters outside of the Latin1 range."); o=o<<8|n}return d}),r.atob||(r.atob=function(r){var o=String(r).replace(/=+$/,"");if(o.length%4==1) throw new Error("\'atob\' failed: The string to be decoded is not correctly encoded.");for(var n,a,i=0,c=0,d=""; a=o.charAt(c++);~a&&(n=i%4?64*n+a:a,i++%4)?d+=String.fromCharCode(255&n>>(-2*i&6)):0)a=e.indexOf(a);return d})})(polyfill); var email = profile.db.identifications.email; var unsubscribeParam = '?persooUnsubscribeEmail=' + email + '&persooKey=' + polyfill.btoa(email); %> <%= subject %>

<% for(i=0; i <% } %>

<% for(i = 3; i < products1.length && i < 7; i++) { %> <% } %>

<%= products1[i].title %>

<%= productCTAButtonText %>
 
<% if (productBlockShowMoreText1) { %>

fields.name: Email Subject

fields.defaultValue:
Clone and modify this template in "Settings > Content Templates". Create your corporate header, colors, fonts and then use it as email template for all your emails. (Update header and footer only in one place, in your email content template.)

Can we help you with finishing the order? Call us on 555 555 5555 or write us on info@eshop.com.

Remember that you have two weeks to return the goods without any quesions asked.
